newsitem.title: USA: Elan Corp Q3 loss $1.43 after charges.
newsitem.headline: Elan Corp Q3 loss $1.43 after charges.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTES: Share and net income information are before charges.

One-time charges in 1996 quarter comprise principally write-off of acquired in-process research and development of $154.4 million related to Advanced Therapeutic Systems Ltd acquisition and $18.0 million from disposing medical nutrition business in current quarter. Company also incurred Q2 for write-off of acquired in-process research and development arising from Athena Neurosciences acquisition on July 1.
The share and per share numbers have been adjusted for the effect of a 2-for-1 stock split effected on August 22, 1996.

Elan changed its reporting currency effective April 1, 1996 from the Irish pound to the US dollar. Prior year amounts have been restated into US dollars at the average rate of exchange between the Irish pound and US dollar applicable during the period reported.
